comments.body: Is it safe to do this many unguarded parent accesses?

Yesâ€”`isConstNamedExpression` guarantees that the third-to-last `.parent` is a `VariableDeclarationList` or `CatchClause`, so the second-to-last is `VariableStatement | ForStatement | ForOfStatement | ForInStatement | TryStatement`, so one more `.parent` is safe from there.
